030package javax.measure.test.unit;
031
032import java.math.BigDecimal;
033
034import javax.measure.Unit;
035import javax.measure.quantity.Area;
036import javax.measure.test.TestUnit;
037
038/**
039 * @author Werner Keil
040 */
041public class AreaUnit extends TestUnit<Area> {
042
043    public static final AreaUnit sqmetre = new AreaUnit("sqmetre", 1.0); // reference
044    // Unit
045    public static final AreaUnit REF_UNIT = sqmetre; // reference Unit
046    public static final AreaUnit sqmile = new AreaUnit("sqmile", 1609.0 * 1609.0);
047    public static final AreaUnit acre = new AreaUnit("acre", 4047.0);
048    public static final AreaUnit hectare = new AreaUnit("hectare", 1.0e4);
049
050    public AreaUnit(String name2, double convF) {
051        super(name2);
052        multFactor = BigDecimal.valueOf(convF);
053    }
054
055    @Override
056    public Unit<Area> getSystemUnit() {
057        return REF_UNIT;
058    }
059}
